model

Class PnZModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • model.PnZModel

  • public class PnZModel
extends java.util.Observable
    The model class of Plants and Zombies. Controls the actual gameplay of the game.
    Version:
    ver 1.4.1
    Author:
    Murdock Walsh, David Falardeau
